Hi all: I need help. I used envyng to install ATI drivers on ubuntu 9.10. I got asked to reboot after the procedure witch I did. Now when the computer boots up I get to a flickering TTY and it hardly responds to any keys. What should I do?!? Please help
Hold shift at boot, and when you see the grub menu choose "recovery mode". From there you can get a root shell and remove the drivers with envyng
OK. I will try that. thanks dude
envyng -t to use the text version of envyng
